summary: Two classified messages, both dated 08 June 62. The first details arrangements for AMBUD-1's visit to PACY, including meetings and tours. It also mentions financing for BOCAL. The second identifies Marco Robles, Minister of Government and Justice.
title: Arrangements for AMBUD-1 Visit & Robles Identification
recipient: WAVE INFO DIR MANA GUAT SALV TEGU SANJ
